{{cpp/container/inplace_vector/title|capacity}}
{{cpp/container/inplace_vector/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++26|
static constexpr size_type capacity() noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the capacity of the internal (inplace) storage. Equivalent to: {{c|return N;}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The maximum number of elements the container is able to hold.

===Complexity===
Constant.

===Notes===
Because each {{c/core|std::inplace_vector&lt;T, N&gt;}} is a fixed-capacity container, the value returned by {{tt|capacity}} equals {{tt|N}} (which is also the value returned by {{lc|max_size()}}).

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;inplace_vector&gt;

int main()
{
    constexpr std::inplace_vector&lt;int, 4&gt; v1;
    static_assert(v1.capacity() == 4 &amp;&amp; v1.max_size() == 4);

    constexpr std::inplace_vector&lt;int, 0&gt; v2;
    static_assert(v2.capacity() == 0 &amp;&amp; v2.max_size() == 0);
}
}}
